content: this is a digital download and not an actual product this pattern is written for beginners pattern details… tips on how to adjust sizing video links to assist with difficult pattern sections lots on images to assist with pattern creation there is a facebook group title fleeting obsessions patterns this page is for pattern owners only it is a place to share images of your creations and ask questions freely please join us 2 fleeting obsessions patterns | facebook materials needed size h 5 00 mm crochet hook size 4 yarn used in images but any size will do may change number of row/stitches needed sewing needle and thread stitch guide us terms chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet stitch double_crochet double_crochet when st counts appear in parentheses repeat popcorn 3 double_crochet cluster together version fp or bp half_double_crochet front post or back post half_double_crochet please read all pattern notes - they are important and were included for specific assistance throughout the build if you have questions about the pattern please read through all notes first before submitting a request for assistance disclaimer ©fleetingobsessionsart2023 all information and photos are the sole property of fleeting obsessions art and krista mccloud do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way items made by this pattern made be sold as long as pattern credit is given to fleeting obsessions art via any of the hashtags or links below watch out for us on any of our socials for tutorial videos and pattern assistance subscribe to our email mailing list for up to date stitch guides as well social media #fleetingobsessionsart #fleetingobsessionscrafts website https //fleetingobsessionsart squarespace com facebook fleeting obsessions | facebook tiktok @fleetingobsessionsart | tiktok instagram @fleetingobsessionsart youtube @fleetingobsessionsart
